general_questions.a: This repository automates the deployment and management of Microsoft Sentinel resources using CI/CD pipelines and code templates.

general_questions.q: What languages are used in this repository?
general_questions.a: This repository uses primarily Bicep and Python, with Bicep for resource deployment templates and Python for automating tasks.

general_questions.q: How do I deploy automations from this repository?
general_questions.a: Use the GitHub Actions workflows included in this repository. They deploy directly to your Azure environment.

technical_questions.q: Where are the ARM/Bicep templates located?
technical_questions.a: These templates are located in the 'templates/' directory.

technical_questions.q: How do I update the deployment workflows?
technical_questions.a: Modify the YAML files in the '.github/workflows/' directory and update the repository to trigger a GitHub Action.
